body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Albert Foster and I'm a customer service agent at Best Motors. How may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Kathleen Lopez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My email is kathleen.lopez@example.com and my phone number is five five five six five five five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. I have noted down your details. Is there anything specific you need help with today regarding our inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm having trouble finding the available stock of SUVs on your website.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Kathleen. Let me check our database for you. In the meantime, could you provide me with your ZIP code and street address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My ZIP code is six eight nine zero zero and my street address is one two three Maple Avenue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Kathleen. I will look into our SUV inventory availability for your area. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
